snippet.title: Dragon Quest 3 HD-2D Remake - Trailer | TGS 2024
snippet.description:
Check out this extended trailer for the Dragon Quest 3 remake, featuring gorgeous new 2D art and animations that bring this classic JRPG into the modern era.

#DragonQuest #Gaming #TGS
